responses.rules:
The tracks played are anything that is considered Deathcore, Metalcore, or Hardcore (or anything core for that matter).

- Maximum song length is 7 minutes.
- Please be respectful of other DJ's

If you have any issues there are plenty of managers, and bouncers that should be able to assist you.
responses.welcome: Welcome to the room XXX! Type /help to learn how to control me!
responses.welcomepm: Welcome to the room. Please read the rules. Or, don't and get thrown out.
responses.masterdjmode: The Master has taken the stage! Bow before XXX!
responses.djmode: XXX has taken the stage to amuse my Master.
responses.blacklisted: You were blacklisted. Please don't come back.
responses.autodjup: Forget the whales! SAVE THE BEATS!
responses.autodjdown: Looks like the rooms a rockin, I'll step down.
responses.notyourturn: Not your turn @XXXX type q to see the order, or q+ to add yourself.
responses.djsteppeddown: Everyone give it up for XXXX!
responses.notheme: No theme right now. So, you know, play some TOOL....
